subject: Golf
British Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: The Swilcan Bridge, a centuries-old structure on the 18th hole at St. Andrews, proves an irresistible draw for golfers, fans, lovers and launderers.
snippet: The Swilcan Bridge, a centuries-old structure on the 18th hole at St. Andrews, proves an irresistible draw for golfers, fans, lovers and launderers.
